con:config.script:
// set the property at the test suite level if needed in multiple testcases testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("context", "Demo-Hospital")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("AdminName", "admin") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("AdminPwd", "admin")
// Roles testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("TP_Role", "TreatingPhysician") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Radio_Role", "Radiologist") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Nurse_Role", "Nurse") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Surgeon_Role", "Surgeon") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Patient_Role", "Patient")
// User creations testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Oncology_HOD", "Oncology_HOD") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Oncology_HODName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Oncology_HOD")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Oncology_HODPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Oncology_HOD")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Oncology_HODEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Oncology_HOD") + "@hospital.com")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Doctor", "Doctor") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("DoctorName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Doctor")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("DoctorPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Doctor")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("DoctorEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Doctor") + "@hospital.com")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Patient", "patient") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("PatientName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Patient")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("PatientPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Patient")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("PatientEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Patient") + "@hospital.com")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("TreatingPhysician", "TreatingPhysician") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("TreatingPhysicianName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("TreatingPhysician")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("TreatingPhysicianPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("TreatingPhysician")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("TreatingPhysicianEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("TreatingPhysician") + "@demohospital.com")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Radiologist", "Radiologist") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("RadiologistName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Radiologist")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("RadiologistPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Radiologist")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("RadiologistEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Radiologist") + "@demohospital.com")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Nurse", "Nurse") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("NurseName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Nurse")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("NursePwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Nurse")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("NurseEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Nurse") + "@demohospital.com")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Surgeon", "Surgeon") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("SurgeonName", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Surgeon")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("SurgeonPwd", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Surgeon")) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("SurgeonEmail", testRunner.testCase.getPropertyValue("Surgeon") + "@demohospital.com")
// Test data variables
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User1", "Lanie Lavallee") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User2", "Elana Cabiness") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User3", "Gilberto Batty") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User4", "Lynwood Francis") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User5", "Roxane Mouton") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User6", "Tommy Chong") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User7", "Duane Holte") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User8", "Dan Thorman") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User9", "Sharon Osbourne") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User10", "Nick Bewley") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User11", "Hiram Caudle") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User12", "Shaunda Connor")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Gender_M", "Male") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Gender_FM", "Female")
testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User1_DB", "1944-10-25") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User2_DB", "1978-01-15") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User3_DB", "1944-04-16") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User4_DB", "1964-05-19") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User5_DB", "1991-10-30") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User6_DB", "1994-10-10") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User7_DB", "1944-12-11") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User8_DB", "1984-08-12") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User9_DB", "1957-03-18") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("User10_DB", "1989-11-22")
